title: Mann Mayal
resume: The story revolves around two neighbors, Manahil and Salahuddin who live in a provincial town in Sindh. Manahil, nicknamed as Mannu is best friend of Salahuddin's younger sister Beeya. Mannu's family is joint and wealthy where as Salahuddin lives a simple life with his mother, father and sister.
